entry.title: Supernihil
entry.summary: Supernihil has been making visuals for raves in Denmark, Sweden and Swiss since 2007. Supernihil is making visuals using code and found footage. The aesthetic is chaotic and organic. Supernihil has been resident on Norberg Festival as well as Loppen (Christiania) where he was partaking in organizing raves as well as visuals and general aesthetic. Supernihil has been involved in generative music videos and research into live video aesthetics. Links:
entry.content:
Supernihil has been making visuals for raves in Denmark, Sweden and Swiss since 2007. Supernihil is making visuals using code and found footage. The aesthetic is chaotic and organic. 

Supernihil has been resident on Norberg Festival as well as Loppen (Christiania) where he was partaking in organizing raves as well as visuals and general aesthetic.

Supernihil has been involved in generative music videos and research into live video aesthetics.

Links:

  • supernihil.buro.earth

entry.title: Salty Brothers
entry.summary: Salty Brothers, Farid (DJ Salty) and Ahmed (Aggi), started DJing together after Ahmed returned from London, where he participated in founding the club FOLD and the record label DIY Records. Salty Brothers specialize in acid, techno, house, electrobreaks and arab-disco. Links: soundcloud.com/ma-hada
entry.content:
Salty Brothers, Farid (DJ Salty) and Ahmed (Aggi), started DJing together after Ahmed returned from London, where he participated in founding the club FOLD and the record label DIY Records.

Salty Brothers specialize in acid, techno, house, electrobreaks and arab-disco.

 

Ma Hada · Mix - Salty

Links:

  • soundcloud.com/ma-hada

entry.title: Otpei
entry.summary: Otpei (Kasper Bjørnsson) comes from the electronic music underground scene in Copenhagen. He was part of the now-defunct record label SygNok Records (Albertslund Terrorkorps, DJ Hvad, among others), a member of the music and event collective Stuelokalet, and has performed a variety of electronic live shows including collaborations with HLLW and WRCK. Otpei has produced music for various other artists in the underground scene and has also played concerts featuring experimental acoustic music. Links: soundcloud.com/otpei
entry.content:
Otpei (Kasper Bjørnsson) comes from the electronic music underground scene in Copenhagen. He was part of the now-defunct record label SygNok Records (Albertslund Terrorkorps, DJ Hvad, among others), a member of the music and event collective Stuelokalet, and has performed a variety of electronic live shows including collaborations with HLLW and WRCK. Otpei has produced music for various other artists in the underground scene and has also played concerts featuring experimental acoustic music.

Links:

  • soundcloud.com/otpei

entry.title: Asmus Busck
entry.summary: Asmus Busck serves a rave'ish dish consisting hot, crispy Vinyls with voluptous hits from the insane techno dance floors og the 90's Links: soundcloud.com/asmusbusck
entry.content:
Asmus Busck serves a rave'ish dish consisting hot, crispy Vinyls with voluptous hits from the insane techno dance floors og the 90's
 
Links:

entry.summary: The electronic music scene in Svendborg has grown in recent years, giving rise to a dance culture and DJ scene showcased at numerous underground events in the city. Sekvens is the label for the Svendborg sound contact: asmusbusck+sekvensburo@gmail.com
entry.content:
The electronic music scene in Svendborg has grown in recent years, giving rise to a dance culture and DJ scene showcased at numerous underground events in the city. 

Sekvens is the label for the Svendborg sound

contact: asmusbusck+sekvensburo@gmail.com
